item.description:
OK, we have the dozen all set to go. We'll need to be there for 8:45 a.m. Let's leave FIT about 7:30 or so. show up earlier for breakfast first... whew.... OK, we can do drive thru's at DD I guess!
Those that have signed up are all approved by the FAA for the tour.

PLEASE NOTE THIS TRIP IS FULL. THE NAMES WERE ANNOUNCED AT LAST MONTHS MEETING AND APPROVED IN ADVANCE BY THE FAA. SORRY FOR ANY MISUNDERSTANDING.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: BOS TRACON
